column4: i see you guys talking about beryl, but it w still beta?wshould you guys even be installing it?
- should we?  Well, I guess what I should and shouldn't do is my business.. installing and using beta software isn't a cardinal sin so I'm okay with it.  :)
- its not like you can't disable beryl if it causes problems.  :)
guys it was more of a question than a suggestion and that's one thing along with that terrible registry that i don't miss
